R

RangeConverter - Interface in rp.warehouse.pc.localisation.interfaces
An interface for a generic range converter, which takes in values read in different scenarios and converts them as though they were taken from within the grid of the warehouse map.

Ranges - Class in rp.warehouse.pc.localisation
A class to store the ranges from all directions.

Create an instance of Ranges given the up, right, down and left ranges to be stored, converting real world or virtual world distances.
